source.6a859283:
Optional Int, maximum length of all sequences. 

If not provided, sequences will be padded to the length of the longest individual sequence.
source.33782a11:
String, 'pre' or 'post' (optional, defaults to 'pre'): 

remove values from sequences larger than maxlen, either at the beginning or at the end of the sequences.
source.7193d8ca:
# maxlen > data length
empty space => fill 0
source.c04ca247: String, 'pre' or 'post' (optional, defaults to 'pre'): pad either before or after each sequence.
source.7c46777f: Float or String, padding value. (Optional, defaults to 0.)
source.3060d2c9: default, appy truncating = "pre" option and truncate first part
